data.text: Yahweh, do not forget King David
He made a solemn promise to you,
He said, “I will not go home,
I will not sleep at all
until I build a place for Yahweh,
In Bethlehem we heard news about the sacred chest.
Later we said, “Let’s go to the temple of Yahweh in Jerusalem;
Yahweh, come to the place where you live eternally,
I want/desire that the righteous behavior of your priests will always be evident,
You chose David to serve you as king of Israel;
Yahweh, you made a solemn promise to David,
If they keep my agreement with them
he said, “This is the city where I will live forever [DOU];
I will give to the people of Jerusalem all that they need;
I will cause the priests to behave in a manner worthy of being ones whom I have saved;
There in Jerusalem I will cause one of David’s descendants [MET] to become a great king;
I will defeat his enemies and cause them to be very ashamed/disgraced;
